name: Dragodrones
description:
Dragodrones is a Openworld Sci-fi game about building and maintaining a colony run by AI drones.

hack into drones and get them to run your base, build items, gather resources, craft items and in future builds defend your base.

This is a Pre-Alpha and is still very early in development, I only started with this project in December 2018, I am uploading this game very early because I want to build the game with player feedback. Right now there is no combat in the game, just the base building and drone hacking part is available, also resources are overly abundant in this build as its should be mostly seen as a proof of concept and a way to get players to play the game and provide feedback.
